author: m.kalinin
content: what's the best way to track the progress on the devnet-0?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: so TTD was not reached on the canonical chain

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Okay TTD reached on the canon chain as well

author: bridge-bot
content:
<parithoshj> Yea, sorry we're kinda flying blind for this devnet. IPs for nodes can be found here: https://github.com/parithosh/consensus-deployment-ansible/blob/master/merge-devnet-0/inventory/inventory.ini
You should have SSH access to the nodes that belong to your team. If not, reach out and i can configure it. Otherwise, configs to setup your own node can be found here: https://github.com/eth-clients/testnet-configs/tree/main/merge-testnets/merge-devnet-0
The chain is chaotic right now, so i guess setting up your own nodes would work better in a while.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I send EIP-4399 transactions on both before and after merge btw

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Is there a way to query the beacon node about attestation percentages, etc?

author: bridge-bot
content: <parithoshj> you can check the metrics (curl metrics port and get the metric value), beacon_participation_prev_epoch_target_attesting_gwei_total/beacon_participation_prev_epoch_active_gwei_total should work on lighthouse
